abstract: Warren Buffett has given away 512,169 Class B shares of Berkshire Hathaway stock to three charitable foundations, in keeping with his plan to give away the bulk of his fortune, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett has given away 512,169 Class B shares of Berkshire Hathaway stock to three charitable foundations, in keeping with his plan to give away the bulk of his fortune, The Associated Press reported.
